title: 2. IRRI Agronomy Challenge 2: Transplanting Day (20 December 2012)

tasks.task: Prepare and use a machine for transplanting plants.
subtasks: Understand the reasons for using machine transplanting over manual methods.
Recognize the benefits of reduced labor and modernization in agriculture.
Learn about the history and adoption of machine transplanting in Asia.
Identify the role of machine transplanting as a business opportunity for farmers.
Familiarize with the seedling preparation needed for machine transplanting.
Observe the challenges and technical aspects involved in operating the machine.
Adjust to the machine's performance and troubleshoot technical issues.
Assess the results of machine transplanting compared to previous manual methods.
